name: JsLint Helper
description:
when use  ":w" to save a .js file, this plugin will validate its content and display the errors via Vim's sign functionality.

see the screen shot:
http://i1021.photobucket.com/albums/af333/aj3423/jslint.png

code stole from Eclim :) 

not tested for linux yet -_-
install_details:
1.  install Jslint
      1)  download it here:   http://www.javascriptlint.com/download.htm
      2)  extract it in some folder, and add this folder to you Environment Path
      3)  try command "jsl" in command line , make sure it is available

2.  put this plugin in your  "/vimfiles/plugin"  folder
